statements: UPDATE user_account_balance SET transaction_amount = 100.0 WHERE user_id = 1 AND transaction_id = 10;

UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 1000 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE transaction_logs SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount - 500, transaction_date = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
